header.title: UTS
header.information: We collaborate with companies to create world-class digital experience and help you do better business through adoption most advanced practices in web development, design, and digital marketing

about.title: Who are we ?
about.info: Uzbekistan Tech Service is an IT company based in Tashkent, Uzbekistan. We work closely with many brands and companies since 2023. Our clients are sacred and our passion is to provide them with utmost support. Discover how we can collaborate to improve the way your business performs.

services.title: What we do ?
services.info: When you sell your products online, you need a long - term strategy with a short - term focus on immediate sales. An alluring web design, consumer - focused content, and the right sales funnel all plays a key role in proper brand positioning.

portfolio.title: Our Porfolio
portfolio.halal: Official website of the World Halal Council. This Council is engaged in issuing Halal certification and currently has more than 20 member countries.
portfolio.chefs: Official website of the Uzbekistan Chefs Association. This association trains and produces professional chefs in Uzbekistan.
portfolio.uzbegim: Famous and reputable Uzbek restaurant located in the center of Riga. For many years, it has been preparing Uzbek dishes in Latvia and has gained a high reputation.
